pr_title: SAK-44024: FORUMS: No tabs on Pending Messages

timeline.message: SAK-44024: FORUMS: No tabs on Pending Messages

timeline.bodyText:
forumsQueueMenuLink is the span, so you don't need to use closest here. In fact you can just use vanilla:
document.getElementById("forumsQueueMenuLink").classList.add("current");
timeline.author: adrianfish

timeline.message:
Cleaned up some indentation

Used vanilla js selectors for applying current class
Made checkbox selectors more specific
